overview: Welcome to the world of ‘Gaymers’, where games, role play and virtual reality all come together to blur the lines of real-life interactions and online and electronic fantasy. ‘Gaymers’ keeps you guessing whether the steamy action is happening face-to-face or mind-to-mind, but it’s always balls out, intense and energized. Director Steve Cruz guides a cast of 10 hung and horny 'Gaymers' through his alternate plane where they play out their hottest sexual dreams in video games, fantasy board games, and go balls deep into the world of virtual reality. Every game they play brings each of them closer together with enough cock sucking and hole plunging action to keep them all occupied for hours.
title: Gaymers
